title.en: Isekai No Ochibi-chan wa Kyou mo Nanika wo Tsukuri Dasu

altTitles.ja: 異世界のおチビちゃんは今日も何かを創り出す～スキル【想像創造】で目指せ成り上がり！～

altTitles.en: Ochibi-chan from Another World Creates Something Again Today ~ Using the Skill [Imagination Creation] to Aim for Success! ~"

description.en: One day, Ochibi (5 years old) who lives in the slums suddenly remembers that she has been reincarnated from another world. Ochibi has the "Imagination Creation" skill, which allows her to create anything she imagines. She decides to start a business with the Japanese items she obtains with her "Imagination Creation" skill! A heartwarming story with a boy named "Onii" and a girl named "Nene" who aim to escape the slums!!
description.ja: ある日突然、自分が異世界から転生したことを思い出した、スラム暮らしのおチビ（5歳）。 おチビは、想像したものを作り出せる「想像創造」スキルを持っていた。 「想像創造」スキルで手に入れた日本のアイテムで、商売を始めることに！ 少年「おにぃ」と少女「ねぇね」とともに、スラム脱出を目指す、ハートフルストーリー!!

altTitles.en: ORV

altTitles.th: อ่านชะตาวันสิ้นโลก

altTitles.ja: 全知的な読者の視点から

altTitles.en: Omniscient Reader

altTitles.vi: Góc nhìn của Độc giả Toàn tri

description.de:
Damals hatte Dokja noch überhaupt keine Ahnung. Er hatte keine Ahnung, dass sein Lieblings-Web-Roman ‘Drei Wege um die Apokalypse zu überleben’ Realität wird und dass er der einzige ist, der weiß wie der Weltuntergang aussehen wird. Er hatte auch keine Ahnung, dass er letztendlich der Protagonist von diesem Roman werden würde. Jetzt begibt sich Dokja auf eine Reise, um den Lauf der Geschichte zu ändern und die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

description.ja:
「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？

altTitles.ja: 英雄と賢者の転生婚　～かつての好敵手と婚約して最強夫婦になりました～

altTitles.en: The Hero and the Sage, Reincarnated and Engaged
The Reincarnated Marriage of a Hero and Sage: After Becoming Engaged to a Former Rival, We Became the Strongest Couple

altTitles.pt-br: Reencarnado • O herói se casa com o sábio ~Depois de ficar noivo de um ex-rival, nos tornamos o casal mais forte~

description.en:
In a world ravaged by war and conflict, Hero Raid Freeden and Sage Eluria Caldwin clashed time and time again over fifty long years as the strongest soldiers of their respective nations. However, their long-standing rivalry came to an inevitable yet bitter end with Eluria’s sudden death. A thousand years later, Raid finds he has been reincarnated—and so has Eluria! The world may now be at peace, but the two have an unsettled rivalry between them and the mystery of their reincarnation looms ominously over their heads. There’s so much that needs to be done, so they decide to...get engaged and attend the Royal Institute of Magic together?!

---

description.ja: 英雄・レイドと賢者・エルリアは長きに渡り戦っていたが、賢者の死により戦いは唐突に終わる。レイドは敵国に乗り込みエルリアの遺体の前で壮絶な死を遂げた…と、思ったら自分は赤子で世界は千年後に!?
description.pt-br:
Reid, um jovem herói com a maior força física, e Elria, uma bela sábia com a maior habilidade mágica.

Eles continuaram a lutar como rivais em nações inimigas opostas, mas seu relacionamento chegou ao fim com a morte repentina de Elria... Então, mil anos depois,

Reencarnou em um mundo onde a magia reina suprema, mas aquele que manteve a força física mais forte de sua vida anterior, Reid, se reuniu com Elria, que também reencarnou—

"Ei, Reid, quero que você se case comigo."

"…Huh?"

Os dois, que se tornaram o casal amoroso inconsciente mais forte em mil anos, matricularam-se na Royal Magic Academy para decidir quem é mais forte!

description.en: The remote town of North Hill has been quarantined to prevent the spread of the mysterious Couper disease that is turning people into cannibals. Young soldier Billy returns to his hometown for the first time in six years for the woman he loves, but what horrors will be awaiting him...?
description.ja: その病は宇宙から飛来し、人から人へと侵攻する――。　隕石から発生した食人病〈クーパー病〉によりロックダウンを余儀なくされた、最果ての街ノースヒル。街を出て軍人となったビリーは6年ぶりに帰郷し、愛するエレノアに求婚する。一人子供を産み育てようとしていたエレノアはビリーとの再会を喜ぶが、出産の最中ノースヒルに再び隕石が!?

description.en: Amidst the freezing winter, a solitary being huddled on the snow-covered pavement, bearing the burden of deep loneliness and faded scars. It had forsaken itself, fragile and vulnerable. The reason for welcoming this nameless creature into the home was straightforward. "What... does this mean?" "You helped me, and I wish to return the favor." In the complete darkness where no trace of light could penetrate, only two warm bodies occupied the space

description.en: That day, Ishida Yamada was working his part-time job as usual. After finishing his shift, he opened the back door and stepped into a vast, empty space, where he encountered a mysterious figure claiming to be God. By sheer chance, Ishida was chosen by this God to be transported to another world. Although confused and uncertain, he resolved to adapt and make a life for himself in this strange new place. Using the skills granted by God, he focused on surviving and thriving. As he explored different lands and encountered various races, he made it his mission to form close relationships with many beautiful women along the way.
description.ja: その日も山田一太はいつもと変わらずバイトをしていた。バイトが終わり裏口の扉を開けると、そこには真っ白な空間が広がっていて、神と名乗る者がいた。 一太は偶然神によって選ばれ、異世界に行くことになった。一太は戸惑いながらも、取り合えず生きていこうと決めた。 神からもらったスキルを使って如何にこの異世界を生き抜くか考えながら、一太はこの異世界にいる美女と肉体関係を持つために色々と頑張っていく。
description.es-la: Ese día, Ichita Yamada estaba trabajando medio tiempo como de costumbre. Cuando abrió la puerta trasera después de terminar su trabajo de medio tiempo, encontró un espacio en blanco y una persona que se hacía llamar Dios. Fue por casualidad que Dios lo eligió para ir a otro mundo. Estaba perplejo, pero decidió vivir de todos modos. Pensando en cómo sobrevivir en este otro mundo usando las habilidades que recibió de Dios, hace todo lo posible por tener una relación física con una mujer hermosa en este otro mundo.
description.pt-br: Naquele dia, Ishida Yamada estava trabalhando meio período, como sempre. Ao abrir a porta dos fundos após terminar seu trabalho de meio período, ele encontrou um espaço em branco e uma pessoa que se autodenominava Deus. Foi por acaso que ele foi escolhido por Deus para ir para outro mundo. Ele ficou perplexo, mas decidiu viver mesmo assim. Pensando em como sobreviver neste outro mundo usando as habilidades que recebeu de Deus, ele tenta ao máximo ter um relacionamento físico com uma linda mulher neste outro mundo.

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?

title.en: Legend of the Galactic Heroes (MICHIHARA Katsumi)

altTitles.ja: 銀河英雄伝説

description.en:
Manga adaptation of 1980s.  
  
Five hundred years ago, Rudolf von Goldenbaum united the disparate governments of humankind and established a mighty human empire, a tribute to his own greatness that stretched across the galaxy. Demanding loyalty and discipline, Rudolf created an order designed to long outlast his own rule; but all human works fade in time. Today, the decaying empire faces the threat of the Free Planets Alliance, and military leaders on both sides jockey for power in the face of a seemingly inevitable conflict. On the side of the empire, the young general Reinhard von Lohengramm sees war as opportunity, and the empire as soft clay ready for his own sculpting. On the side of the alliance, would-be historian Yang Wen-li would like nothing better than to live out his days in peace - but times of war have little use for men who waste their days studying the mistakes of the past. Circumstances will make heroes and villains of both these men, as they write new history one blood-splattered page at a time.  
  


---
description.ru:
История человечества всегда была историей войн, во все времена, во все эпохи. И во все эпохи находятся люди, оставляющие след в истории, чьи имена выжжены на её скрижалях. Этих людей называют героями.  
В третьем тысячелетии, когда люди давно переселились с Земли на просторы Галактики, между абсолютной монархией Галактический Рейх и республикой Союз Свободных Планет уже 150 лет продолжается война. И на озарённом пламенем войны небосклоне зажигаются звёзды героев, судьба которых - изменить мир.

description.ja: 〈ウルトラジャンプ連載作品〉仕事のストレスに加え、長年飼った飼い猫を失い不眠＆食欲不振ぎみのアラサー青年いおり。疲れ切った夜、迷い込んできた黒猫を家にあげて世話すると、翌朝、全裸の美少女が横に寝ていて…‼︎?？「あたしを飼わせてあげる」ーー強引勝手気ままな彼女の正体は…？？
description.uk:
"Ми їстимемо разом, спатимемо разом і поліпшуватимемо якість життя Іорі разом".

Іорі - молодий чоловік, який на додачу до стресу на роботі ще й колись втратив улюблену кішку, а тепер страждає від безсоння й анорексії. І ось одного ранку він виявляє, що поруч з ним спить красива оголена незнайомка...

description.en:
Sijila was once the most adorable mythical creature in the world. Its overwhelming cuteness earned it the reverence of humanity, granting it a carefree life of plenty. However, as people became preoccupied with admiring Sijila's charm and stopped being productive, coupled with Sikila's ever-growing appetite, it soon consumed all the world's resources.

The gods could no longer tolerate its behavior. They stripped Sijila of all its "cuteness power," turning it into a ridiculed ball of flesh. They transformed a mere fraction of its "cuteness power" into a group of little Corgis, tasked with helping it atone for its sins.

description.en:
Princess Fairis, reincarnated into the world of strategy simulation games, uses her knowledge of the games she played in her previous life and is called the Warrior Princess. However, as soon as the war ends, she is ordered by the king to marry. In addition, she competes with her sister in arranged marriages and, depending on her partner, cannot get involved in national politics. ...I want to build my country, not get married! As she struggles to arrange a political marriage that will give her more territory, Orpheed, a wizard who is also her trusted subordinate and a potential bride, unexpectedly confesses his love for her...?

A love comedy between a reincarnated princess with zero love skills and the strongest wizard with an intense love.

The bullied loser Kim Jaehyuk receives 'Top 1 Fighting Tutoring'!
Kim Jaehyuk is a high school student who has been living in despair under the torment of bullies. He's good at studying, but he'd rather be good at fighting.
Then, as if by fate, a 'fighting tutor' comes into his life!

description.en: "Only do good deeds."—Asura follows his late mother's teachings and always strives to do good in life. No matter how much he is bullied, he goes on with a smile, firmly believing that evildoers will receive divine punishment. Until one day, an ominous old man offers him a key that can open the doors to hell...
description.pt-br: "Faça apenas boas ações". — Asura segue os ensinamentos de sua falecida mãe e sempre se esforça para fazer o bem. Não importa o quanto seja zoado, continua com um sorriso, acreditando firmemente que os malfeitores receberão uma punição divina. Até que, certo dia, um velho agourento lhe oferece uma chave que pode abrir os Portões do Inferno...

description.en: Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.

description.en: Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まった。自堕落な一人暮らしを送る周を見かねて、なにかと世話を焼く真昼。お互いに興味ないと言い合う二人は、それでも少しずつ距離を縮めていく……。
description.pl: Mahiru jest piękną dziewczyną, którą koledzy z klasy nazywają "aniołkiem". Jest nie tylko świetnie wysportowana i ma doskonałe oceny - jest także zabójczo piękna. Amane, przeciętny facet i samozwańczy niechluj, nigdy nie myślał zbyt wiele o tej boskiej piękności, mimo że uczęszczał do tej samej szkoły. Wszystko zmienia się jednak, gdy widzi Mahiru siedzącą samotnie w parku podczas ulewy. Tak zaczyna się dziwna relacja między tą nieprawdopodobną parą!
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

description.en:
Nikaido Katsuo, AKA “Fist King”, is the most powerful and undefeated delinquent in Japan. However, no one knows that behind the stories of his legendary battles, there is a girl behind the scenes… Her name is Tabara Nikaido. She is the fighter who took her brother's name and fought in secret, and defeated all the strong men in her way…… A slightly naughty story about a legendary fighter who happens to be a “tsuyokawa” JK!
___

description.en:
Tatsumi is a fighter who, accompanied by his two childhood friends, sets off to the Capital in search of a way to make money to assist his poverty-stricken village. After being separated from his friends, Tatsumi not only fails to enlist in the army, but is swindled out of all his money. He is then taken in by a noble family who offer him help; after finding himself in a messy situation Tatsumi is rescued by a group of assassins known as Night Raid, and is invited to join their ranks. Composed of the swordswoman Akame, a young woman armed with a huge pair of scissors named Sheele, the string manipulator Lubbock, the armored warrior Bulat, the sniper Mine, the beast fighter Leone and their leader Najenda, Night Raid is also part of the revolutionary forces assembled to overthrow Prime Minister Honest, who manipulates the young emperor for his and his men's personal gain, leading the rest of the nation to poverty and strife.

description.ru:
Простой деревенский парень отправился в столицу, чтобы прославиться. Но что то пошло не так: его не взяли в армию, обокрали, а милая девушка, приютившая его, оказывается матерым убийцей в юбке, убившая его друзей. Но не все еще потеряно. Ему посчастливилось встретить членов группы ассасинов "Ночной Рейд". После этого дела пошли в гору.  
  
See [AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=15919) for the anime.

altTitles.ja: バンプアー

altTitles.en: Bumpman Poor

description.en: His life hits rocks bottom, but he is the ultimate in assassinations. The legend of a hitman with absolute lethality begins. 333 yen in his pocket. Occupation: assassin. In a life of extreme poverty, all he has is hunger and his mission. Whenever his stomach rumbles, the poor but strong Nojima Ryou appears, shattering both reality and fiction! The start of a pitch-black assassination drama depicted with overwhelming realism!!
description.vi:
Cuộc sống đang ở đáy, và sự ám sát đang ở đỉnh cao. Truyền thuyết về sát thủ cực kỳ nguy hiểm khai mạc từ đây.

Anh ta có 333 yên. Nghề nghiệp: sát thủ. Trong cuộc sống cực kỳ nghèo khó, tất cả những gì tồn tại chỉ là đói khát và nghĩa vụ. Ryo Nojima, một người đàn ông nghèo nhưng mạnh mẽ xuất hiện khi bụng anh bắt đầu cồn cào, phá hủy cả thực tế và hư cấu!
Câu chuyện ám sát đen tối, được miêu tả với hiện thực choáng ngợp, bắt đầu!!

altTitles.en: Daily Chaldea

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

Jahy-sama Won't Be Discouraged!

altTitles.ja: ジャヒー様はくじけない！

description.en:
Jahy-sama (pronounced jah-hee) is an existence to be feared and respected throughout the Demon Realm. Well, was.

The (former) Demon Realm No. 2 is now busy with house chores and work…in the human realm! Her dinner is just beansprouts, and she can't afford anything except water at cafes, but she won't get discouraged!

---
**Note:**
Jahy's shirt says '魔界復興', which seems to translate to 'Demon Realm Restoration'.
description.ru: Джахи-сама - существо, которое боялись и уважали во всем демоническом мире. Ну, когда-то... Вторая по силе (прежде) мира демонов теперь занята домашними заботами и работой... в человеческом мире! Её ужин - одна фасоль, а в кафе она не может себе позволить ничего кроме воды, но её никогда не сломить!

title.en: I Failed to Divorce My Husband

altTitles.ko: 흑막 남편과의 이혼에 실패한 것 같다

altTitles.ko-ro: Heungmang Nampyeongwaui Ihone Silpaehan Geon Gatda

altTitles.en: My Failing Divorce
I Am Afraid I Have Failed to Divorce My Husband

altTitles.fr: Je n'ai pas réussi à divorcer de mon (vilain) mari

altTitles.pt: Falhei em me divorciar do meu esposo

altTitles.ja: 黒幕夫に惚れられました

description.en:
I've been reincarnated as the extra character who stalked her husband, the male lead, for 10 years and died. Of course, I tried to divorce him before the female lead appeared.

But, I found out that my young husband was secretly abused in the house. At that moment, I immediately became overwhelmed with the responsibility and sense of duty a modern adult would have. 

**

Aiden had his back turned away from her and suddenly grabbed her arm forcefully. The strength of his hands alone could have ripped her arms off. Erin timidly called his name and spoke. 

"I already reminded you yesterday. We're a married couple, so I'm always on your side." 

"..."

"So, everything is alright." 

She comforted him with these sweet words like it was a spell. And as if he was under her magic, Aiden stopped trembling. 

**

The adult Erin requested to divorce her husband Aiden before the female lead appeared. As soon as those words left her lips, Aiden's smile disappeared. 

"A divorce? Never."

Aiden tore the divorce papers into such thin sheets, the contents were no longer legible. Erin smiled at the sight. (Synopsis source: Gourmet Scans)

---
Ellen's plan is simple. Before turning into an obsessive villain who gets executed, she's going to get a divorce! But after she becomes Ellen Lianster, her plan gets complicated. Her new husband, Aiden, has developed a debilitating fear of being touched, and Ellen is determined to discover the cause and cure. As she finds ways to help him, an affection-deprived Aiden slowly begins to seek comfort from Ellen. With both hearts opening up to each other, can this marriage succeed... at failing?
description.fr: J'ai été réincarnée en tant que la figurante qui a harcelé son mari, le rôle masculin principal, pendant 10 ans et qui est morte. Bien sûr, j'ai essayé de divorcer avant que le personnage principal féminin n'apparaisse. Mais j'ai découvert que la nounou de mon jeune mari abusait secrètement de lui. À ce moment-là, j'ai immédiatement été submergée par la responsabilité et le sens du devoir d'un adulte moderne. *** Aiden, qui lui tournait le dos, lui a soudainement saisi le bras avec force. La seule force de ses mains aurait pu lui arracher les bras. Erin l'appela timidement et prit la parole. «Je te l'ai déjà rappelé hier. Nous sommes un couple marié, alors je suis toujours de ton côté.» «...» «Alors, tout va bien.» Elle le réconforta avec ces mots doux comme s'il s'agissait d'un sortilège. Et comme s'il était sous sa magie, Aiden cessa de trembler. *** Erin, adulte, a demandé le divorce à son mari Aiden avant que le personnage principal féminin n'apparaisse. Dès que ces mots ont quitté ses lèvres, le sourire d'Aiden a disparu. «Un divorce? Jamais.» Aiden a déchiré les papiers du divorce en feuilles si fines que le contenu n'était plus lisible. Erin sourit à cette vue.
description.zh: 漫画简介: 社牛打工人穿成会被疯批男主处死的小恶女，却意外发现10岁的男主是个缺爱小可怜。每天糯叽叽黏人的正太小乖乖，在小恶女的养成下，还会成为腹黑疯批吗？

altTitles.en: Raised by Villains

altTitles.ja: 悪党たちに育てられてます！

altTitles.pt-br: Eu Estou Sendo Criada por Vilões

description.en:
I thought I was an illegitimate child… but it turns out that I was a complete stranger?!

A year after transmigrating as an extra, I found out that I was on the verge of being kicked out.

I said I’d rather leave the house on my own.

“Actually, this child is my daughter. Right, daughter?”

Did I catch the attention of the psychopathic duke?

‘I heard that the money he gave after playing with someone was enough to buy an island?’

I got along with him as his daughter because I thought I could get his fortune later on. And a few months later, I would leave his house with a thick bank account.

“Stay by my side until I tell you to leave.”

However, my dad, who regarded me as a toy, came looking for me and held me back.

=

After returning home due to dad’s persuasion, the families and my dad fought to adopt me. My uncles and aunts gathered to protect me, and future psychos began to have strange obsessions over me.

“Happy Birthday, Ayrin. You’re the head as of today.”

On top of that, the duke’s position was my birthday present.
Everything is going just as I expected.

[Hey, how long are you going to sleep? Grandma said she is gonna take you off life support!]
[Cha Miso, you’re going to die!]

What is that voice?
Will I be okay like this? (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)
description.tr: Gayrimeşru bir çocuk olduğumu sanıyordum… ama tamamen yabancı olduğum ortaya çıktı?! Yan karakter olarak beden değiştirdikten bir yıl sonra kovulmanın eşiğinde olduğumu öğrendim. Evden tek başıma çıkmayı tercih ederim dedim. “Aslında bu çocuk benim kızım. Değil mi kızım?” Psikopat dükün dikkatini mi çektim ? "Biriyle oynadıktan sonra verdiği paranın bir ada almaya yettiğini duydum?" Onunla kızı olarak iyi anlaştım çünkü daha sonra servetini ele geçirebileceğimi düşündüm ve birkaç ay sonra onun evinden kalın bir banka hesabıyla ayrılmayı planladım. "Sana gitmeni söyleyene kadar yanımda kal." Ancak beni oyuncak gibi gören babam beni aramaya geldi ve beni tuttu. *** Babamın iknasıyla eve döndükten sonra aileler ve babam beni evlat edinmek için mücadele etti. Amcalarım ve teyzelerim beni korumak için toplandılar ve geleceğin psikopatları bana karşı garip saplantılar beslemeye başladılar. "Doğum günün kutlu olsun Ayrin. Bugün itibariyle başkan sensin.” Üstelik Dük'ün konumu benim doğum günü hediyemdi. Her şey beklediğim gibi gidiyor. [Hey, daha ne kadar uyuyacaksın? Büyükanne sana tutucunu çıkarmanı söyledi!] [Cha Miso, öleceksin!] Bu ses nedir? Böyle iyi olacak mıyım?
description.pt-br: Negligenciada por sua família, Cha Miso sonha em viver em seu romance favorito como a amada personagem principal. Então, um dia, ela acorda dentro do romance, mas como Eiryn Etam, uma personagem secundária oprimida que será expulsa de sua casa! Para evitar mais negligência, ela planeja ir embora antes que isso aconteça. Mas quando Erno Etam, o herdeiro maluco da Casa Etam, afirma que Eiryn é sua filha, seus planos são frustrados e Eiryn se vê no meio de um conflito entre a Casa Etam e um elenco de vilões.

description.ar: بعد وفاة ابنها بطريقة مروعة، تكتشف والدتهُ تنمر الآخرين الشديد عليه، فعقدت العزم على معاقبة أولئك المتنمرين الذين أخذوا ابنها الحبيب منها، وبدأت العمل كممرضة في المدرسة
description.en: The Nagare family was a happy home of three people. However, their son Kiritaka was secretly bullied at school. Then, an incident occurs, and the mother Mari's love for her son goes out of control.
description.ja: 親子3人で幸せな家庭を築いていた流（ながれ）一家。だが、息子の桐崇は学校でひそかに虐めにあっていた。そして起きてしまったある事件をきっかけに、息子を想う母の愛が暴走していく――。
description.ne: आमाबुवा र छोरासहित ३ जनाको नागारे परिवारको खुसीको घर थियो। तर, उनीहरुको छोरा किरिताकालाई विद्यालयमा गोप्य रुपमा कुटपिट गरिएको थियो।  त्यसपछि, एउटा घटना घट्छ, र आमा मारियाको छोराप्रतिको माया अनियन्त्रित हुन्छ।
description.vi:
Một gia đình ba người những tưởng đang hạnh phúc, cho đến khi Kiritaka, người con trai duy nhất của Nagare Mari "tự sát" vì "quá đau khổ". Cho rằng bản thân đã vô tình dồn ép con trai yêu quý, Mari toang tìm đến cái chết, nhưng không... cô vô tình phát hiện ra sự thật con trai mình đã liên tục bị bắt nạt suốt một thời gian dài bởi những con quỷ đội lốt người tại trường học.
Và rồi tình thương con da diết của Mari... đã vượt ngoài tầm kiểm soát của trái tim cô.
description.es-la: La familia Nagare era un hogar feliz formado por tres personas. Sin embargo, su hijo Kiritaka sufría acoso escolar extremo en secreto. Entonces, ocurre un incidente que haría que el amor de la madre, Mari, se descontrolara por completo.

description.en: Mysterious alien life-forms invade Earth! Most of humanity is wiped off the face of the planet. John, his sister, and the remaining survivors hope to find a new world to inhabit… But one day, they’re targeted by aliens again! (MANGA Plus)

altTitles.en: Destiny Unchain Online: After Becoming a Vampire Girl, I Eventually Became Known as "Crimson Demon King"

altTitles.th: Destiny Unchain Online เดสทินี อันเชน ออนไลน์ ~เมื่อผมกลายเป็นสาวน้อยผีดูดเลือดแล้วถูกขนานนามว่าจอมมารสีชาด~

description.en: Mitsuki Kou is such a feared PVP gamer that he's earned the nickname "Crim the Headhunter" in some circles. His next game to take over? "Destiny Unchain Online", a brand new VRMMO game developed by none other than Kou's father. But, no new game on release day is without its bugs - namely, Kou glitches to the middle of nowhere, and his vampire avatar is turned into a girl!  A story for all of the people who through games have met new friends and aimed for the top... start!
description.id: Mitsuki kou, seorang gamer dengan skill hebat yang memiliki nama lain,  yaitu "pemburu kepala Cream". Berpartisipasi dalam sebuah game baru "Destiny Unchain Online" yang dibuat oleh ayahnya sebagai tester perangkat game baru, tetapi segera setelah dimulai, karena sebuah bug ia menjadi gadis vampir. Ketika ia bertemu dengan teman-teman yang baik, pada saat itulah ia akan mulai menyelesaikan game, sebuah cerita tentang seorang gamer terbaik yang segala sesuatunya berubah…… sudah di mulai!
description.ja: 神がかったプレイヤースキルを持ち「首狩りクリム」の二つ名で知られるゲーマー、満月紅。父親が作った新作ゲーム『Destiny Unchain Online』に新型ゲームデバイスのテスターとして参加するが、開始早々バグだらけで姿は吸血鬼種族の少女に。最高の仲間と出会い、ゲームを攻略して行くうちに、何もかもが変わっていく最高のゲーマー物語……開幕！
description.ko: 압도적인 스킬을 가지고「목 사냥꾼 크림」이라는 별명으로 알려진 게이머, 미츠키 코우. 아버지가 만든 신작 게임 『Destiny Unchain Online』에 신형 게임 장치 테스터로 참가하지만, 시작하자마자 오류투성이로 흡혈귀 종족의 소녀가 되어 버리는데. 최고의 동료와 만나고, 게임을 공략해 나가다 보니,모든 것이 변해 가는 최강 게이머 이야기… 개막!
description.th: มิตสึกิ โค เกมเมอร์ฝีมือฉกาจที่รู้จักกันในนาม ‘คริมนักล่าหัว’ ได้เริ่มเล่นเกม ‘Destiny Unchain Online’ ที่พ่อของเขาสร้างในฐานะเทสเตอร์ของเครื่องเล่นเกมรุ่นใหม่ล่าสุด แต่ไม่ทันไรก็เจอบั๊กมากมายจนกลายเป็นเด็กสาวเผ่าผีดูดเลือดไปซะอย่างนั้น เรื่องราวของเกมเมอร์ผู้เก่งกาจที่ทุกอย่างเริ่มเปลี่ยนไปเมื่อได้พบกับพรรคพวกสุดเจ๋งและผจญภัยในโลกแห่งเกม... เปิดฉากแล้ว ณ บัดนี้!
description.vi: Kou Mitsuki là một game thủ với những kỹ năng phải nói là quá ghê gớm, có biệt danh là "Thợ săn táo Crim". Cậu tham gia thử nghiệm một thiết bị trò chơi mới cho trò chơi mới mà do chính cha của cậu tạo ra, "Destiny Unchained Online". Nhưng trò chơi đầy lỗi khi bắt đầu và phá vỡ giấc mộng trở thành nam ma cà rồng cool ngầu của cậu. Gặp gỡ những đồng minh tuyệt vời và bắt đầu cuộc chơi như vũ bão, câu chuyện về một game thủ hàng đầu nơi mà mọi thứ hay bất kì cái gì đều có thể thay đổi... bắt đầu!
description.pt-br: Mitsuki Kou é um jogador PVP tão temido que ganhou o apelido de "Crim, o Caçador de Cabeças" em alguns círculos. Seu próximo jogo para dominar? "Destiny Unchain Online", um novo jogo VRMMO desenvolvido por ninguém menos que o pai de Kou. Mas, nenhum jogo novo no dia do lançamento está livre de bugs - ou seja, Kou sofre um glitch para o meio do nada, e seu avatar de vampiro é transformado em uma garota! Uma história para todos que através dos jogos fizeram novos amigos e miraram no topo... comece!

title.en: City Where the Moon Does Not Rise

description.en:
Ha-jeong, a high school girl living an unfortunate life, has only a glimpse of the daily life of the influencer "Daldalrun."

Ha-jeong has an obsession level of affection for her and even hacked into the wall pad of her house and peeks at even her very private life. One day, while peeking into Daldalrun's room as usual.

Ha-jeong witnesses Daldalrun's death, and the next day, she finds she's possessed Daldalrun's dead body....

description.en: When the Devil King announces his retirement, he calls forth his two sons, Yomi and Sora, to give them each a quest. Whichever of them finds a pure Yamato maiden within a year would inherit the throne of the Devil King, while the other would die. Thus begins Sora's sex-fuelled adventure to find a woman that can satisfy his father…

description.en:
Christmas season.

Hasegawa Yuuta found himself single after breaking up last month when his girlfriend had cheated on him. And it was only a few days until Christmas! After an everyday conversation with his female friend, Mino Ayaka, Yuuta met a beautiful girl clad in a Santa suit—In a lane full of couples no less! Her name was Shinohara Mayu. Will this encounter with Shinohara turn out to be the Christmas present for Yuuta?
description.ja: クリスマス直前に彼女に浮気された大学二年・羽瀬川悠太。 意気消沈する彼の前に、サンタの格好をした美少女後輩・志乃原真由が現れる！ グイグイ来る彼女は、次第に家にまで上がり込むようになり…！？
description.ru: Однажды за несколько дней до Рождества, молодой Хасегава Юта тяжело расстался со своей бывшей девушкой, которая ему изменила. После повседневного диалога со своей давней подругой Мино Аякой, Юта встретил красивую во всех смысла слова девушку по имени Маю Шиномия, одетую в костюм Санты. Неужели внезапная встреча с кокетливой красоткой станет рождественским подарком для Юты?
description.pt-br:
Época natalina.
Yuuta Hasegawa ficou solteiro após terminar o namoro no mês passado, quando sua namorada o traiu. E faltam apenas alguns dias para o Natal!
Após uma conversa casual com sua amiga Ayaka Mino, Yuuta encontra uma linda garota vestida de Papai Noel - justamente em uma rua cheia de casais! Seu nome era Mayu Shinohara.
Será que esse encontro com Shinohara vai se tornar o presente de Natal para Yuuta?

altTitles.en: Temp Worker and Career Woman

altTitles.ja: 派遣とバリキャリ

title.en: Tsurenai Hodo Aokute Azatoi Kurai ni Akai

altTitles.ja: つれないほど青くて あざといくらいに赤い

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsurenai Hodo Aokute Azatoi Kurai ni Akai

altTitles.es-la: Tan frío como el azul y tan agresivo como el rojo

altTitles.vi: Xanh đến nỗi Lạnh Lùng, Đỏ tới mức Xảo Quyệt

description.en: Is this senior... female? Male? Neutral? Demonic? A transfer student suffering from an incurable disease called curiosity meets a mysterious being (human) who is beautiful, cute, cool, and terrifying. The first of a new generation of horror comic authors presents an abyssal love story, a ghost story to peek into and sensuality to you.
description.ja: 覗いてはいけない、だから、覗きたい。　この先輩は…女性？　男性？　中性？　魔性??　好奇心という不治の病を患う転校生が出会ったのは、美しく、可愛らしく、格好よく、恐ろしい、謎の存在（ヒト）だった。
description.ru:
Мой сэмпай... Кто же это? Девушка? Парень? Оно? Демон?.. Главный герой — переведенный ученик старшей школы, страдающий неизлечимым чувством любопытства натыкается на красивое, милое, крутое и опасное создание (человека?). С этого момента и начинаются их необычные отношения.

(Source: mangalib)
description.vi: Liệu senpai này là... Nữ giới? Nam giới? Vô giới? Ác quỷ giới?? Một học sinh chuyển trường mắc một căn bệnh vô phương cứu chữa gọi là sự hiếu kì đã gặp phải một tồn tại bí ẩn dưới hình dạng của một con người vô cùng xinh đẹp và dễ thương nhưng cũng rất lạnh lùng và đáng sợ. Một câu chuyện tình yêu nơi vực thẳm, một câu chuyện ma quái đầy gợi cảm, mang đến cho bạn bởi tác giả đứng đầu về một thế hệ mới của truyện kinh dị...!

title.en: Isekai Pornstar ~Shiru Danyuu ga Isekai Tensei Shite Ero Chishiki Furu Katsuyo de Musou Danyuu ni Naru Hanashi~

altTitles.ja: 異世界男優～汁男優が異世界転生してエロ知識フル活用で無双男優になる話～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Danyuu ~Shiru Danyuu ga Isekai Tensei Shite Ero Chishiki Furu Katsuyo de Musou Danyuu ni Naru Hanashi~

altTitles.en: Pornstar in Another World: A Story of a JAV Actor Reincarnating in Another World and Making Full Use of His Porn Knowledge to Become a Matchless Pornstar

altTitles.ru: Порнозвезда в другом мире ~История порноактёра, переродившегося в другом мире и использующего свои познания в порно для становления несравнимой порнозвездой~

description.en: On his way home from work Aokai Seiji, a struggling actor in the JAV film industry, accidentally looked aside and got hit by a magic mirror JAV Truck! He wakes up in a medieval-like world and gets caught up in the "filming" with beautiful elves?!
description.id: Seiji Aokai, seorang aktor di industri AV, saat perjalanan pulang kerja dia di tabrak truk magic mirror dan terbangun di dunia seperti abad pertengahan, dan entah kenapa dia terlibat dalam "NGENTOT" dengan para Elf cantik?
description.ja: AV業界で奮闘する汁男優・青飼征史は、仕事帰りについよそ見して、マジックミラーで覆われた例の車に激突！ 目覚めた先の中世のような世界で、美女エルフたちの「撮影」に巻き込まれて？
description.ru:
По дороге домой с работы Хироши Аоки, начинающий актёр в японской порноиндустрии, случайно попадает под грузовик!
Он просыпается в средневековом мире и оказывается втянутым в "съёмки" с прекрасными эльфийками?!

title.en: Classmate wa Isekai de Yuusha ni Natta kedo, Ore dake Gendai Nihon ni Okizari ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: クラスメイトは異世界で勇者になったけど、俺だけ現代日本に置き去りにされました

altTitles.en: My Classmates Became Heroes in Another World, But I was Left Behind in Modern Japan

description.en:
"Congratulations! You 25 have been chosen as heroes to save the world!"

Just before summer vacation in their third year of middle school, the class is suddenly transported to another world by the goddess Ashera. The 26 students are given statuses that allow them to use skills and cheat abilities to become heroes in the other world. However, the number of students transported is 25—leaving behind Iori Shu, the boy who had just transferred and wasn’t counted.

While his classmates train in the other world to prepare for their battles as heroes, Shu remains in peaceful Japan, devoting himself to studying the status he was given. Quietly experimenting with his skills, he occasionally uses them to help those around him. But before he realizes it, Shu has become a target of various organizations around the world—!?
description.ja:
「おめでとう！　君たち25人は世界を救う勇者に選ばれました！」

中学3年の夏休み前、突然現れた女神・アシェラによって行われたクラス単位の異世界転移。
26人の生徒は異世界で勇者になれるよう、スキルやチート能力を使うことができるステータスを与えられ転移させられる。しかしその人数は25人――転校したばかりでカウントされていなかった少年・伊織修は現代日本に置き去りにされた。

異世界で鍛練し、来る勇者としての戦いに備えるクラスメイトとは違い、平和な日本で修は与えられたステータスの研究に没頭する。密かにスキルの性能の試行錯誤をしつつ、その力で時折身の回りの人助けをしていた修だが、いつの間にか世界の組織から狙われるような存在になっていて――？

title.en: Multiverse no Watashi, Koishite Ii desu ka?

altTitles.ja: マルチバースの私、恋していいですか?

altTitles.en: Is It Alright for My Multiverse Self to Fall in Love?

altTitles.vi: Em của đa vũ trụ có thể yêu anh được không?

altTitles.ja: マル恋

description.en:
Jogo has a crush on his classmate, Miyato. 

One day, they unexpectedly end up walking home together after school. When Miyato is about to be hit by a truck, Jogo throws himself in harm's way to save her. In the final moment before impact, Jogo wishes he could have told Miyato how he felt. 

But then he hears a mysterious voice saying, "You can do it over. This time, don’t have any regrets."

When he wakes up, he finds himself unharmed, lying on the ground, with a different version of Miyato beside him — she looks the same, but her clothes and hairstyle are different...?
description.ja:
本当なら出逢えていなかった、私とあなた。好きだと言わなくても後悔はしない？

可能性を切り拓く、マルチバースラブコメ読切！

altTitles.ja: ヴェール

description.en:
"He", a police officer on his shift, happened to meet "her" on the streets, by chance.

Through its bold yet delicate brushwork and elegant prose, this stylish, full-colour comic
illustrates the subtle air of intimacy between these two individuals.

---
A chance encounter. A handsome policeman. A beautiful woman. A tentative love affair smolders on the snowy cobblestone streets, 
out of sight from those that might keep them apart. 

*Veil* is a beautifully illustrated full-color romance manga, told in stylish short vignettes, beautiful illustrations, and secret moments.
description.pt-br: Eles se conheceram na rua por acaso. Ele era policial e ela caminhava pela rua. Através de suas pinceladas ousadas, mas delicadas e diálogos elegantes, esta história refinada e colorida, ilustra o ar sutil da intimidade presente entre os dois.

title.en: My Roommate Is the Great Old Ones

altTitles.th: รูมเมทของฉัน ดันเป็นเทพบรรพกาล……

altTitles.ja: フールナイト

description.en:
In the distant future, earth is covered by thick clouds and deprived of the warm rays of sunlight. Natural plants have all but withered, leading to low levels of oxygen everywhere. 

However, humans have developed a technique to transform people into plants to produce a small amount of oxygen that allows mankind to keep surviving. In this world, everyone must decide: Will they live as humans in a bleak and uncertain world, or abandon their anguish to embrace a new life as plants?
___
[Alt Official English (Shougakukan Asia)](https://shogakukan.asia/fool-night/)
description.ru:
Продолжать прикладывать усилия ради жизни человеком? Или же красиво осыпаться, подобно цветку? Душевно изображенный неизвестный мир будущего!

Мир далёкого будущего окружают облака, не пропускающие дневной свет, увядших растений и недостатка кислорода. Однако, люди разработали технологию превращения человека в растение для получения кислорода и продолжают выживать.
Перед людьми встаёт нелёгкий выбор - продолжать выживать в этом безнадежном мире людей или же, отбросив страдания, сделать шаг в новую жизнь в виде растений?
description.vi: Trong tương lai, trái đất bị các đám mây đen che phủ. Không còn ánh sáng mặt trời, thực vật chết dần, lượng oxi tụt giảm mạnh. Tuy nhiên, con người đã tìm ra thứ công nghệ "biến người thành thực vật" để sản xuất thêm lượng oxi ít ỏi giúp con người sống sót.

altTitles.ja: ファンタジスタ

description.en: Teppei Sakamoto is a boy living in the countryside. He loves soccer, and all his soccer skills were taught to him by his sister. Finally, his sister wants him to join the Mizumoto High School soccer team. Teppei's turn in life has come!! How will this soccer newbie fare in his new environment?

title.en: Gekouchuu ni Ame ga Futtekita Kara Kouhai no Kasa ni Irete Morattara...

altTitles.ja: 下校中に雨が降ってきたから後輩の傘に入れてもらったら…

altTitles.ja-ro: Gekouchuu ni Ame ga Futtekita Kara Kouhai no Kasa ni Irete Morattara...

altTitles.en: On Our Way Home from School, My Kouhai Shared Her Umbrella with Me Because It Was Raining…

altTitles.ja: ソードアート・オンライン・ユナイタル・リング

altTitles.en: SAO Unital Ring

description.en: A year has passed since Kirito and Asuna’s return from the Underworld. With them is Alice, who has been given a physical body. But their peace is quickly broken when the three are suddenly thrust into an unfamiliar game, Unital Ring. This new world is a survival MMO that fuses together every VRMMO created with the Seed program. As soon as it starts, Kirito finds himself with nothing but his underwear. Now, he’s got to challenge a mysterious VRMMOSVG under desperate circumstances!
description.es-la: Ha pasado un año desde el regreso de Kirito y Asuna del Underworld. Con ellos está Alice, que ha recibido un cuerpo físico. Pero su paz se rompe rápidamente cuando los tres se ven empujados de repente a un juego desconocido, Unital Ring. Este nuevo mundo es un MMO de supervivencia que fusiona todos los VRMMO creados con el programa "The Seed". Nada más empezar, Kirito se encuentra sin nada más que su ropa interior. Ahora, ¡Tiene que desafiar a un misterioso VRMMOSVG en circunstancias desesperadas!

altTitles.en: Prince of Tennis

altTitles.ja: テニスの王子様

description.en:
Ryoma Echizen just joined the Seishun Academy's tennis team, which is known for being one of the most competitive teams in Japan. Its members are incredibly talented, gifted, and athletic. With rigorous and extremely intense practices, the upperclassmen of the team expect the very best from themselves and they expect even more from the new members of the team. While most of the freshmen are on pins and needles hoping they won't get cut from the team, Ryoma Echizen is confident, cool, and collected. Some might even say he's cocky, but at least he's got the skills to back up his attitude. With his virtually unreturnable "twist serve," Ryoma is sure to make the starting team.  
  
Join Ryoma and the other first years, as they train hard, make friends, and try to find a place for themselves on the team. Ryoma Echizen is the Prince of Tennis. He may be ready for the Seishun Academy tennis team, but are THEY ready for HIM?
